description:
SocialRadar gives you real-time information about the people around you. Know who’s around. See how you’re connected. Discover what they’ve been up to. All while controlling your privacy on one beautiful app. 

Imagine walking into a room already knowing there are 4 co-workers, 2 college friends, and 3 friends of friends nearby. And that one of your college friends just got engaged and your co-worker was just promoted. 

It works by combining your phone’s location info with the chatter from your social networks. 

Most importantly, you have total control over your privacy. You can share your information publicly, just with your friends, be anonymous, or be invisible. 

***** 

The most powerful application ever created for: 
• Being aware of the people and connections around you 
• Seeing where your friends are 
• Making new connections 
• Professional networking 

***** 

So many cool features for free: 
• Find people based on similar backgrounds, interests, or characteristics 
• Set your radar range to see people in a specific or broad location 
• Completely control your privacy settings—be public, anonymous, or invisible 
• See everyone’s current social media posts from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+, and Foursquare 
• Locate friends on a map or use the radar feature to walk right up to them 
• Chat with friends nearby or far 
• Control your battery consumption with our Battery Manager 
• Set custom alerts to get notified if certain people or people with certain interests are nearby 
• And so much more 

***** 

We want to keep improving this App with your help. Please email Michael, CEO of SocialRadar with any questions or comments. Mike@socialradar.com 

***** 

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. 

Give it a try and live life connected.
releaseNotes:
v2.0 - Greatly improved the user interface. We made it even easier to see how you are connected to the people nearby.

v2.0.4 - Now supports iOS 8! Many bug fixes too.
